column4: I didnt created SWAP partition during installation coz i have  2.5GB ddr ram .Is it ok ?
depends what you're doing, it should be able to function, but maybe not do all the things you expect it to do
is there any special reason you didn't make a swap?
if you still have the install CD, you should be able to resize the partition using that in Live mode, though you may have to add the partition editor to the software
